name: disproportionate
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
too large or too small in comparison to something else, or not deserving its importance or influence: disproportionate number There are a disproportionate number of girls in the class.disproportionate to The country's great influence in the world is disproportionate to its relatively small size.

too great or too small when compared to something else: The sheer size of the company gave it disproportionate influence in dealing with the Pentagon and Congress. disproportionately adverb us
